column6:
- Furniture in the bedroom was purchased in Oct 2016
- Bed sheets are washed before new guests arrive
- Clean towels provided daily
- Bathroom is frequently cleaned
- DFW Airport is 26mi and Love Field Airport is 22mi away
- Large table in separate room for dinning or working
- Jack and Jill bathroom
- High speed wifi internet
- Free coffee (Keurig) 
- Home is in safe neighborhood with security system
